name: Giselle Ayala
summary: Public Relations Manager with over 7 years of PR and marketing experience, specializing in B2B technology, media relations, branding, events, and fundraising. Proven track record in company rebrands, website overhauls, international campaigns, and crisis communication, with strong leadership, content development, and stakeholder management skills.

experience.title: Public Relations Manager
experience.description: Managed media relations with local and national press; created press releases; invited and hosted press at events. Created marketing materials including press one-sheets, social media flyers and monthly newsletters. Ran national tour campaigns including booking, social media promotion and media outreach.

experience.title: Marketing Director
experience.description: Created and executed marketing plans for annual fundraising events. Managed marketing sites (Resident Advisor, Nitevibe, SF Gate, SF Station, Facebook, GoFundMe, 32auctions, etc.). Served as project lead for fundraising events, coordinating staff and volunteers, developing talent lineups, managing sound logistics and venue relations. Directed creative/content with designers for event flyers and promotional items; managed street team and media outreach; produced monthly newsletters communicating monetary goals and health/treatment updates.

experience.title: Public Relations & Marketing Manager
experience.description: Public relations and marketing management for BlackArrow, providing advertising and data solutions for next-generation TV. Led PR for corporate, partner, and product marketing; built and maintained global media relationships, managed speakerships, webinars and thought leadership. Created press releases and collateral; managed corporate website, blog, and social channels; coordinated with partners and creative agencies on joint materials; planned and executed annual marketing plans and budgets; organized corporate events and conferences; collaborated with technology partners to develop joint materials.
